TopicTitle: KSP Crashes on Launch after Mod Installs

Articles.Content:
Hi all, new KSP player here. I have been trying to install mods via CKAN, but KSP now always crashes after the loading screen.

The log file is here:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/rmr18ajfsbzbk7u/2015-10-14_220422.7z?dl=0

Any help is appreciated!
Which mods do you have installed? It could be that you have too many, or maybe one is bugged. If you can list the mods you have selected in CKAN we will be able to help better

You ran out of memory: (from output_log)

Could not allocate memory: System out of memory!
Trying to allocate: 357913940B with 4 alignment. MemoryLabel: NewDelete
Allocation happend at: Line:0 in Overloaded New[]
Memory overview

Try deleting mods or using active texture management.

Visual mods are the ones that use the most memory, followed by part mods.

using active texture management.

What are ppl using nowadays for this? Any tips? :3

The Active Texture Management mod ?

(Sorry if my post wasn't written correctly)

(Sorry if my post wasn't written correctly)

It was not only correct, but lovely aswell. Thanks for the heads-up!
